metadata.name: Industrial Sector
metadata.description:
Massive.

This is one word that I would choose to describe this abandoned factory/warehouses. This location has multiple structures that have an enormous amount of empty space within. An abundance of people have explored this place as many music videos and such were shot here. Photographers of all kinds have taken photos here.

Usually while exploring this building you will see younger kids hanging out within the property or sometimes a few homeless people. I usually go here during the daytime but I have been here for a few sunsets. It is very eerie after dark.

This reflection highlights the amount of space left behind to rot away. The lines of columns and windows create an industrial feeling showing that massive machinery used to reside here.
